candidates.title: Build docs with feature flag tags for docs.rs
candidates.body:
Follow up to https://github.com/busyboredom/acceptxmr/pull/59.

This enables those cool feature flag tags, only for https://docs.rs, e.g:

![example](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/101352116/235004615-3799a27c-3df8-4fb4-845c-ac17213e2023.png)

This feature is nightly only but:
- It's only enabled for docs.rs
- docs.rs uses a nightly compiler

To show the tags locally you can use:
```
RUSTDOCFLAGS="--cfg docsrs" cargo +nightly doc --all-features
```

candidates.title: Build docs with all features for docs.rs
candidates.body:
Builds documentation with `--all-features` (only for https://docs.rs)

Closes https://github.com/busyboredom/acceptxmr/issues/51.

candidates.title: Abstract storage layer away
candidates.body: Remove mandatory dependency on sled, and enable library consumers to define arbitrary storage layers.
